import React, { useState } from 'react'; import "./Register.css"; let submit_disabled = true; function Redirect() { window.location.href = "/thank-you" } function SubmitRegistration(event) { event.preventDefault(); const url = "https://script.google.com/macros/s/AKfycbzbknbXB0Lv6ITPCxbyEaGUkpkiQsvOBkQ_kOUmQobDSi6Yl1i-bURMWuuV4AKKOoWM/exec"; const form = document.forms['sheets-form']; fetch(url, { method: 'POST', body: new FormData(form)}) .then(response => Redirect()) .catch(error => alert(error.message)) } export default function Register() { return (
